item.title: [639]ECLIPSE/dementhium/rawrscape/quantum question[639] HELP NEEDED
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

So i tried to make it so that when you are a donator you would get bonous expreience

so in Skills.java i searched

then i changed it to:

public static double XP_MODIFIER;{ if (Player.getDonor() == 1) { XP_MODIFIER = 20; } else if (Player.getDonor() == 2) { XP_MODIFIER = 25; } else if (Player.getDonor() == 3) { XP_MODIFIER = 30; } else if (Player.getDonor() == 4) { XP_MODIFIER = 35; } else{ XP_MODIFIER = 15; } }

but then it says non static method getDonor() cannot be refered from static context

i tried to remove the static main word bit it still shopws that error

any of you have any suggestions to how i can do this or am i doing anything wroing?

thx in advance
